label: ThirdWeb Event Trigger
name: thirdWebEventTrigger
description: Start workflow whenever a ThirdWeb event happened

actions.label: Contract Address
actions.name: contract
actions.description: Navigate to ThirdWeb -> Code -> Getting started -> Javascript, copy the address used in the code section

actions.label: Prebuilt Contract Type
actions.name: contractType
actions.description: Navigate to ThirdWeb -> Code -> Getting started -> Javascript, select the prebuilt contract used in the code section. Ex: await sdk.getContract("0x...", "nft-drop")

options.label: Edition Drop
options.name: edition-drop
options.description: Release ERC1155 tokens for a set price.

options.label: Multiwrap
options.name: multiwrap
options.description: Bundle multiple ERC721/ERC1155/ERC20 tokens into a single ERC721.

options.label: NFT Drop
options.name: nft-drop
options.description: Release collection of unique NFTs for a set price

options.label: Pack
options.name: pack
options.description: Pack multiple tokens into ERC1155 NFTs that act as randomized loot boxes

options.label: Signature Drop
options.name: signature-drop
options.description: Signature based minting of ERC721 tokens.

options.label: Token
options.name: token
options.description: Create cryptocurrency compliant with ERC20 standard

options.label: Token Drop
options.name: token-drop
options.description: Release new ERC20 tokens for a set price
